name: Steel Train
description: '''Steel Train''' was an indie rock band from [[New Jersey]]. They performed at [[Bonnaroo]], [[Lollapalooza]], [[Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival|Coachella]], ''[[Late Night with Conan O'Brien]]'', and ''[[Late Show with David Letterman]]'', and toured with several acts, including [[Tegan and Sara]], [[Fun (band)|Fun]], [[Ben Folds]], [[O.A.R. (band)|O.A.R.]], [[Finch (American band)|Finch]], and [[the Get Up Kids]]. The band played their final show at the [[Bowery Ballroom]] in January 2013.
